import numpy as np

source.32e93ce7:
def getOutliersBasic(df):
    setup(data=df,silent=True)
    knn = create_model('knn')
    knn_df = assign_model(knn)
    abnormalData = knn_df[knn_df.Anomaly == 1]
    return abnormalData
source.2c04372f:
def getOutliersTuneVersion(df,target):
    setup(data=df,silent=True)
    tuned_knn = tune_model('knn', supervised_target = target,fold=5)
    tuned_knn_df = assign_model(tuned_knn)
    abnormalData = tuned_knn_df[tuned_knn_df.Anomaly == 1]
    return abnormalData
